messages.subject: Re: Archive request
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Helen and all No, I don t - because they only keep the last 15 digests! 8-)  Anything prior to digest 29 is now deleted, according to the ONEList admin
messages.messageBody:
Hi Helen and all

No, I don't - because they only keep the last 15 digests! 8-) Anything prior to digest 29
is now deleted, according to the ONEList admin team....they suggested I ask people on the
list if they have them saved and can forward them to me.

Hope someone can help!

Cheers
Mandy

Message: 9
Date: Fri, 4 Jun 1999 18:51:33 -0800
From: Home Education Magazine <HEM-Editor@...>
Subject: Re: Intro/Archive request

At 11:41 AM +1200 6/5/99, ML Tyler wrote:
>I'll phrase my request first: does anybody have copies they can forward to
>me of the digests from the list, numbers 1- 28 inclusive?

Mandy, you just need to go to the http://www.onelist.com website, click on
the Member Center, then click on this list, then click on the Archives
button. Everything that's been said on this list is saved there. <s>

Helen
